text: Rudi Kurz (9 May 1921 - 2020) was a German actor, screenwriter and film director. He was born in Ludwigshafen am Rhein, Germany. He is known for directing Das grüne Ungeheuer and Die Spur führt in den 7. Himmel. He also directed television shows such as Es geht nicht ohne Liebe. Kurz died in 2020 at the age of 99. ==More reading== * Ingeborg Münz-Koenen: zu „Hans Beimler, Kamerad“. in: Fernsehdramatik. Experimente, Methoden, Tendenzen.
